More Service Cloud Features

You can use the new Einstein Reply Recommendations Value Dashboard to quickly build and dig into reports and visualizations for replies' business value, KPIs, and exclusive analytics.

The dashboard uses chat data, agent interaction metrics, and cost assumptions specific to your company to measure Reply Recommendations performance against your business objectives. You can see impact on case Average Handling Time and estimate cost savings.

To get the app template, download the Einstein Reply Recommendations Value managed package from AppExchange.
title: Track Service Performance with Einstein Reply Recommendations
